name: Create or update a subscriber in MailChimp from a new member in Invision Community
description:
This template regularly checks for new forum members in an Invision Community and uses the retrieved information to create new subscribers in MailChimp. Existing subscribers will only be updated.

The template is scheduled to run every hour. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module but you will also need to change the filter between the modules to reflect your new schedule otherwise you will end up with multiple attempts to create the same subscriber or no attempt at all.
